name: Poly gone into orbit
description:
Poly gone into orbit:

A minimalist caravan shmup made for the Gunner Parade '22 Winter League.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • WASD to change the shot
  • Shift to move slowly
  • Space to bomb

Press '?' for in-game help.

Any feedback is appreciated :)

Known bugs:

  •  bullets are sometimes deleted twice, crashing the game.
  • previous build's restart function was also crashing the game, so it has been removed until that is fixed.
